Room.Name: Middle Circle of Etolos
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the middle circle path around the Etolos complex.
Room.LongDescription: Despite the primative nature of the druids, you sense that they are actually more civilized than the modern townsperson. The peace and tranquility are resounded in the atmosphere of group participation and cooperation. Outsiders have mocked the Etolian Druids because of these primative attitudes, but in fact, they have survived longer than any other human civilization in the world.
